title: The 15-Minute Daily Typing Routine for Busy People
description: You don't need hours. Improve your speed with this efficient, focused daily practice schedule.
author: Free Online Typing Team
content:
Minute 0-2: Warm Up

Type easy sentences slowly to loosen fingers.

Minute 2-7: Accuracy Focus

Type difficult texts or code snippets. If you make an error, delete the whole word.

Minute 7-12: Speed Bursts

Sprint typing. Go as fast as possible on simple words, ignoring some errors.

Minute 12-15: Cool Down

Medium speed, focus on rhythm and flow.
